flawed_nl_solution:
On the second row, he used 9 - 2 = <<9-2=7>>7 blocks.
On the third row, he used 7 - 2 = <<7-2=8>>8 blocks.
On the fourth row, he used 8 - 2 = <<8-2=6>>6 blocks.
On the fifth row, he used 6 - 2 = <<6-2=4>>4 block.
Therefore, he used a total of 9 + 7 + 8 + 6 + 4 = <<9+7+8+6+4=34>>34 blocks.
